verbs.description: < p > [V: Speaking] [ARGM-LOC: at a press conference after his summit with Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: Trump] paid tribute to the U.S. college student who died after being detained in North Korea.</p >

< p > Speaking at a press conference after his summit with Kim Jong Un , Trump paid tribute to the U.S. college student who died after [V: being] detained in North Korea.</p >
